posts.title: Scaffolder is the GOAT 🐐
posts.content:
Just tried out the Scaffolder, and wow, it’s like having a personal assistant for your codebase. I typed one command, and boom 💥—it built an entire feature while I made coffee.

Who needs sleep-deprived late-night coding sessions when you’ve got a tool that practically writes your app for you? If this keeps up, I’ll be out of a job… or maybe promoted to 'Chief Scaffolding Officer' 🤓. Either way, 10/10 would scaffold again!

posts.title: Another bloated tool 🙄
posts.content:
Scaffolder? More like Scuffle-der. I gave it a shot, and now my project’s directory looks like a file hoarder’s dream. Do I really need 10 different files just to add a button? What’s next? A template for writing comments?

Honestly, this is just overengineering for the sake of it. Back in my day, we copy-pasted everything like true warriors. But hey, if you enjoy pretending you’re a code wizard while a script does the real work, go for it. 🙃
